message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special introductory price of $120. I think you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $110. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I can see you're serious about the product, but I still need to make a decent profit. I'm willing to go a bit higher to $112.50. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $108?
I'm starting to think we're close, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to compromise at $115. Let's meet in the middle again!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $110?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $115, but I'm willing to meet you halfway at $112.50 again. This is my final offer, let's make a deal!
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $109?
